name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
name_original: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
description:
Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas is an action game developed by Small Rockets. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Atari. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas has a score of 58. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas on PC.
